page.title: 10RECREATION.
page.content: TROON CRUISING CLUB WAS FOUNDED IN 1955.Two TROON men CHARLES McKINNON and GORDON HINDMARSH were the first members and were soon followed by other enthusiastic sailors.In 1950 TROON DOCKS BOARD charged fees for berthing.It was decided to form a club.In 1960 TROON SAILING CLUB WAS formed.This was sited at the NORTH SHORE.However the cruising boats required deeper berths and thus they moved to the harbour area.In 1976 the MARINA was excavated and the CRUISING CLUB were asked to leave.They took their case to Parliament in LONDON and were given 1400 feet of the basin.All the boats are racing boats and on WED.evenings meet for pursuit races.A yearly event is the CARRADALE WEEKEND which is a racing and social weekend.
